title: Wanda Sykes
description:
We're revisiting some of the best moments from Comedy Gold Minds this week, featuring Kevin's interview with comedian, actress, and upcoming co-host of the 2022 Oscars alongside Amy Schumer and Regina Hall, Wanda Sykes. They discuss how she started writing for Chris Rock, why she thinks there’s no such thing as cancel culture, knowing her audience and what they enjoy, and why she’s excited for the future of comedy.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Wanda Sykes)
